This article is a part of a series where I go through teachyourselfcs. If you would like to start at the beginning start here.

LECTURES

L1

Course concentrates on broad ideas in computer architecture. C is close to underlying hardware.



What is the cloud?
The cloud is a data center of computers in a warehouse. They need to be near a river (to cool the computers) and low power cost. Also need to be in a secret location to avoid malicious attacks.
